title: Baby Carrier
description: black, white and green rectangular flap, 16-1/2\" x 14\", sewn to top is very sophisticated geometric pattern of squares in cross stitch; main body is overall geometric embroidery in green and blue bordered in silk and woven cotton on black; white gusset-like patches embroidered with blue, pink and brown butterflies; remaining part of ties repeat this motif; black lining
